t: A decade after acquiring Kiva, Amazon unveils its first AMR
s: June 24, 2022 - Amazon first entered the mobile robot space in 2012, when it acquired Kiva Systems for $775 million. Kiva offered automated guided vehicles (AGVs) that could navigate a warehouse using a series of computerized barcode stickers on the floor.

t: Look back on 10 years of Amazon robotics
s: June 21, 2022 - Proteus autonomously moves through our facilities using advanced safety, perception, and navigation technology developed by Amazon.
